Name: Psycho地雷InLove : 싸이코지라이 인 러브
About the game: 'Excuse me... What's the menu for lunch today?' With that one word, our fling began. It's natural for a normal Eunta A, who has nothing superior, but he's never talked to a woman. Ryu Sun-ah, who greeted him warmly for the first time. Wouldn't it be okay for a lifetime with her? A, who has never been in a relationship, win the heart of Ryu Sun-ah! Eun-Tta's psycho-jirai in love, let's start! --------------- About this game & features--------------- The game is played in three phases - early, mid and late The user will have four conversations with Sun-ah in each phase, and Sun-ah will ask questions related to her once. The user answers the question based on the information obtained from the previous line with Sun-ah, and if it is correct, the likability increases and if it is incorrect, the likability decreases. This favorability determines the ending at the last phase, and users can view various CGs and illustrations. --------------- Operation--------------- Select: Right-click Metabolic progression: right-click, scroll down mouse, enter key Rollback : Scroll over mouse (Note: Rollback may cause errors) Image Skip: Keyboard ESC Key ----------------- How to play------------------- Answer Sun-ah's questions and build up affinity through in-game options. A date event will be held at the end of each of the four questions, and you can view various endings depending on your preference on the last date. -----------------Resolution------------- The game is fixed at a 16:9 ratio resolution for optimal play. Please note this when adjusting the resolution.
